topicTitle: Let me Formally introduce my self, hello.

posts.postText:
Hey all, My name is CoreyW.Rogerson and i thought i would let you know a little about me since i am part of this lil'' community.
first of all let me say that i absolutely love the TTT server, mainly be cuase of the people that play. the "hands" feature is pretty
 unique, and im all for unique. Also, the points system is pretty cool also. i havent seen that before and i think its a way of displaying
experience, and seniority. well, enough about that, let me tell you some stuff about me. im 17 years old, and cannot wait to be 18.
I play ALOT of PC games because mouse+keyboard >controller. i am an avid Garrysmod player, i've played CSS for  a while and HL2 is fun.
i also have COD4-Blackops, i used to play competitively. i played minecraft for a short while and, well, blahh. i dont like it.lets seeeee. i also 
have DODS which i dont really like. i Dont like the whole "Older war" genre. i like futuristic or modern stuff. i also like racing games, burnout 
series especially. so i hope to stay apart of this community and make a few (more?) friends. 

-CROGERSON

Your grammar annoys me and there's two L's in the title.

No, I'm totally kidding. About the grammar, that is.

Welcome to the forums! :D
